name: Burger Jump
description:
Burger Jump is a 3D infinite jumping platformer. The goal of the game is to get the highest score you can by jumping on platforms. However, if you fall or hit an enemy, the game is over! This game is very simple and easy to play. Multiplayer is also implemented, but there might be some bugs.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse to look around

This is the first game I solo developed. Thank you for checking out this game!
